detailsData.title: Experienced Team
detailsData.content: Our lawyers are accomplished trial attorneys with result driven success in Personal Injury Law. We have represented hundreds of clients and have obtained over $25,000,000 in settlements and verdicts.

detailsData.title: Personalized Care
detailsData.content: We work closely together to ensure that our clients get the medical treatment they need, the support they deserve, and the representation their families rely upon.

detailsData.title: 24/7 Availability
detailsData.content: Reeves Whalen, and his practice exercise the highest level of integrity I have seen amongst law firms. He was available 24/7 via phone, text, and email.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Approach
detailsData.content: Our team of attorneys are recognized leaders in Personal Injury Law and Colorado Civil Practice, offering a different approach to personal injury representation.

address: 7955 East Arapahoe Court, Suite 2375, Centennial, CO 80112
subHeading: A Powerful Voice in Personal Injury Law
valueProp: Our firm exclusively represents clients against insurance companies and corporations in personal injury matters. We have represented hundreds of clients and have obtained over $25,000,000 in settlements and verdicts. We work closely together to ensure that our clients get the medical treatment they need, the support they deserve, and the representation their families rely upon.

testimonalData.text: I'm not sure any other lawyer would have come out on top with my case but Reeves exceeded expectations! Im forever grateful to Mr. Whalen and his team.
testimonalData.author: Heidi

testimonalData.text: This is a great firm, Reeves was always available 24 hours a day and worked with me on nights and weekends. They really work hard for their clients.
testimonalData.author: Addison

testimonalData.text: Reeves Whalen went above and beyond in my case and accomplished things I didn't think were possible! He is highly skilled with significant expertise and knows how things work in the real world.
testimonalData.author: Cheryl
